premises: The community promotes individual freedom or social cohesion but not both at the same time

conclusions: If the community does not promote social cohesion, it promotes individual freedom
incorrect conclusions: The community does not promote social cohesion

premises: The organization supports individual interests or collective interests but not both at the same time
